## TransactionTransformer type

Receives a transaction and returns an new transaction.

Can be used to update the transaction and customise commands.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TransactionTransformer<GSchema extends EditorSchema = any> = (tr: Transaction<GSchema>, state: EditorState<GSchema>) => Transaction<GSchema>;
```
